name: Spears and Spiders VR
description:
ATTENTION: This game requires a VR headset to play

Spears and Spiders VR is a game where you fight off an endless army of rock spiders while defending the crystals they are trying to steal. Survive for as long as you can and try to beat your own high scores.

Controls:
Grip Button: Grab/Throw Spear
Right Control Stick: Rotate

Please be careful when throwing spears as they do not require much force. If you are having trouble throwing them, try releasing the grip button sooner.

This is the first VR game I have developed for the oculus quest 2. Other VR headsets should work but have not been tested. All assets other than music were created by me.

Music Used:
Crowd Hammer by Kevin MacLeod
